game.name: reTri
game.description: reTri is a minimalist style arcade shooter, based around primitive shapes. Originally developed for a school project, it was eventually expanded over the period of several months.

game.name: Different
game.description: Different was a group project for a school-based 72-hour game jam. A team of 7 students were tasked to develop a game with the following theme: Special, Fateful, Abstract.

game.name: Tunnel Visioned
game.title: Tunnel Visioned
game.description: Tunnel Visioned is a simple infinite runner, developed as a personal challenge to complete a game within 48 hours. Since initial completion in November 2015, it has been refined and subsequently released in January 2016.
